page.title: 04Housing
page.content: The second square in our project is rather unique in the Crawley set up. This particular part of Pound Hill is Unique in as much as the property in this area is entirely made up of privatly owned accommodation,mostly being detatched houses.The average cost of these homes in 1985 is { {Â£60,000}considerably higher than other areas of Crawley. The street names in this area follow the pattern of themes as used in all the Crawley Neighbour hoods.The themes adopted in this area are linked to {University Colleges}e.g Oriel Close, Balliol Close, Trinity Close and Pembroke Close.{and Authors} KIpling Close, Belloc Close andBurns road.In a survey we discovered that a considerable number of people in this area commuted daily to London to work. MOst of the people surveyed had attended some form of higher education
